short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify contact imports from LinkedIn to our sales platform with ease. Streamline your workflow today!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Breakthrough extension seamlessly integrates with your Chrome browser, streamlining the process of importing contacts into our AI-powered prospecting and pitch platform. No more tedious manual data entry - with just a few clicks, you can effortlessly transfer contacts into our system.

Why should you download it? Because it saves you time and effort. Instead of spending valuable minutes inputting contact information manually, our extension automates the process, allowing you to focus on what truly matters - connecting with prospects and closing deals.

By leveraging our platform's AI capabilities, every imported contact is thoroughly analyzed, providing you with valuable insights to tailor your pitches effectively. With the Breakthrough Chrome Extension, you can enhance your sales performance and fill your pipeline with high-quality leads in no time.

Please note that currently, we only support importing contacts from LinkedIn. However, we are constantly working to integrate more platforms in the future, ensuring even greater convenience for our users.
